item.description:
Bring your favorite games and/or friends. We will be the group in the middle of the restaurant having all the fun.  I will always bring some games from my collection.  If you want to play a particular game I have brought to past events, please let me know so I will be sure to add it to my game bag. If necessary, we will divide into smaller groups depending on group size and game preference.

As per the usual, since this is a public restaurant, please order a little something at least as we are customers using their dining space.  

Hope to see you all there.
item.how_to_find_us: We are usually at tables in the middle of the dining area.

group.name: The Salem Board Games Meetup Group

item.name: "Across the Bridge" Game Night
